Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Canberra (A.C.T.) - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "Holiday". Australia's capital city, although relatively young, offers a range of cultural, historical and natural attractions. Enjoy panoramic views of Canberra from a hot air balloon, a ride into Snowy River country, a 4WD adventure through the ACT or a coach tour to the War Memorial, the National Film and Sound Archive, Parliament House or the National Art Gallery.
